body.description: Who wouldn't be happy to receive a letter with lovely flowers and animalsChoose stationery with your name or wording on it, so that children will want interesting paper to write on! This letterhead provides an area for them to draw their favorite things about heaven, or to write a personalized letter.Size:Stationery:8.2 x 5.7 in (21 x 14.5 cm)Envelope:5.9 x 3.5 in (15 x 9 cm)Packing list:60 x stationery30 envelopes30 x double sided adhesive stickerReminder:The colors may vary slightly due to the settings and type of display.Customer care:We are committed to providing you with quality products and impeccable customer service. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this product!!
reviews.reviewText: I love this set of stationary!! It is so pretty. I love the way it came to me- mini sets of individual patterns with sufficient paper to write three 2 page notes with coordinating envelopes. The envelopes do not have adhesive on them. But…included are double sided tape pieces to seal the letter securely.The prints, the price and paper quality- superb!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice 5x7 size, sturdy paper. Envelopes are typical envelopes in nice colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these different stationary, its a perfect letter size, has nice little picture, and I've always lived stationary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but not exactly what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Wanted an old fashioned stationary set, but with a little whimsy. These definitely have whimsy, and only one side of the papers are able to be written on. Oh well, I will use them and just be more careful with purchases going forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Stationary Set
reviews.reviewText: I love these cute little letters! I write to pen pals and I use these as my stationary and absolutely love them! They're unique and darling! definitely recommend for your letter writing needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One side only
reviews.reviewText: Since letter writing paper is apparently no longer sold in stores, I'm always on the lookout for stationery. This set comes with several different cute designs and matching envelopes. Each set comes in its own plastic envelope. Unfortunately for my purposes (writing multi-page letters), nearly all of the paper sheets in this set have busy designs on the back, making it impossible to write on the back of the page. The designs are very cute, just not practical if you're planning to write very much. Also, for some reason, the envelopes have no adhesive on the flap. You will need to use some tape or glue to seal the letters shut. The envelopes are quite small, so that the paper must be folded in thirds (rather than just once in the center) in order to fit. Since stationery is so hard to find these days, this set is a nice one to use, but there are a few drawbacks to consider if you want to write long letters or send any enclosures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Each set of paper and envelopes is in its own clear bag, and these come in another bag. Despite not being shipped in something sturdy, they arrived in mint condition. The envelopes do not have adhesive attached, but double-sided tape is included.The paper seems high-quality (maybe 25 lb?), and the printing is as pictured. If I ever need stationary again, I’ll rebuy this one.Tips for the tape:- Remove the thin, long strip on the end- Remove one of the tape strips. Sometimes I had to rip it off quickly to prevent the tape from ripping.- Fold two corners along the long edge so that the tape sticks to itself, and then unfold the paper covering. This will leave 2 triangle pieces of glue on the strip.- Stick the tape on the envelope, just under the center part of the bottom of the envelope.- Remove the paper and place the envelope flap on the exposed tape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So nice, I will give to one of my sisters as a gift.
